transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Ji sir. Good afternoon.
Executive: Hindi mein baat karu right?
Customer: Haan ji sir. Aap company se baat kar rahe hai sir?
Customer: Company ka naam Punamiya Exim Private Limited hai.
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: Punamiya Exim Private Limited.
Executive: Punamiya Exim Private Limited. Haan sir, dijiye.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Aap hi mere ko phone karte the na ki isme by lead by wo kijiye. Aap hi karte the.
Executive: Haan sir. Ji ji ji. Mai hi call karti hu. Mai hi aapka account dekhti hu sir. Kashish mera naam hai.
Customer: Okay. Accha madam mai kya bol raha hu. Haan. Toh mai kya bol raha hu abhi accha mere ko meri ye ek madam hai. Toh unko samjhane ka hai pura properly ki kaise images dalna hai, kaise save karna hai, kaise uske andar wording dalna hai. Toh aapka free ho kab dal sakte hai kya timing hai?
Executive: Abhi, abhi bataiye mai abhi samjha deti hu unko video meeting ke. Haan. Mai Google meeting ki link share karti hu sir. Toh uske through mai sara samjha dungi sir.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Thik hai. Aapki jo registered mail ID hai na, usme maine ek link share kari hai. Aap check kariye. Kaunsi mail ID hai?
Customer: Aapke paas kaunsi mail ID hai?
Executive: Ek minute. Punamiyaexim09@gmail.com.
Customer: Whatsapp pe share karu kya sir?
Customer: Haan whatsapp pe karo na better rahega madam.
Executive: Ji. 893 yehi isi number pe hai na?
Customer: 9870827893.
Executive: Ji. Maine whatsapp pe share kiya hai sir. Aap bol dijiye madam join kar le isko.
Customer: Haan share kiya hai abhi tak aaya nahi hai. Aata hai toh mai join karta hu.
Executive: Yehi toh number hai na aapka 9870827893.
Customer: Haan haan haan aaya aaya aaya aaya abhi aaya. Ji sir.
Customer: Aaya. Ek minute ha.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Accha wo bhi sath mein hi hai. Uska naam khushi hai na? Khushi hai.
Executive: Khushi. Haan ji.
Customer: Yes. Thik hai. Abhi mai ek minute inko mute kar raha hu.
Executive: Thik hai. Toh sir ek kaam kariye aap screen share kijiye.
Customer: Ek minute. Isse toh phir join kiya hai na aapne?
Executive: Haan haan.
Executive: Video meeting mein aawaz aa rahi hai aapko meri?
Customer: Abhi mai band kar raha hu. Mobile band kar raha hu.
Customer: Mobile band kar raha hu madam.
Executive: Ji sir ji. Ji sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs assistance with image uploading.

Resolution:

- Executive shared Google Meet link for assistance.

- Executive shared the link on WhatsApp.

Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- google meet, screen share, image upload
